name: RaysonWiFiLightDemoV2
0:
”Alexa, turn on First light”
”Alexa, turn off First light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The skill is used to control the WiFi Light device by using Alexa App or Amazon Echo. The WiFi light device can be discovered y the Alexa App and controlled by the Alexa App. The skill only support turn on and turn off the WiFi Light device

Smart home WiFi Light command:
1. Alexa, turn on First Light
2. Alexa, turn off First Light
